Question
========

In an experiment on intelligence, reaction time is measured to a question in 25 subjects. The mean reaction time is 16.2 seconds and the standard deviation is 2.0 seconds. A 95% *confidence interval* for this mean is

Answerlist
----------

* (15.37, 17.03).
* (16.03, 16.37).
* (16.04, 16.36).

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* (15.37, 17.03).: Correct
* (16.03, 16.37).: Incorrect
* (16.04, 16.36).: Incorrect
